content: As an AI language model, I do not have knowledge of current events or recent developments. However, in general, the Speaker of the House in Georgia does not have direct control over specific departments or agencies that receive state funding. However, the Speaker of the House has significant influence over the budget process, particularly the appropriations committee. This committee is responsible for recommending funding levels for specific departments and agencies, and the Speaker can use his or her position to advocate for the funding of certain programs or initiatives. Additionally, the Speaker may have the ability to influence the appointment of key officials within these departments and agencies by recommending candidates to the Governor or working with other legislative leaders.
